value.name: Man arrested amid probe into police officer’s murder
value.description: A man has been arrested by detectives investigating the murder of police officer Michael Ferguson in Londonderry in January 1993.

value.name: Detectives investigating murder of police officer in Derry in 1993 arrest man (51)
value.description: Detectives from the PSNI Legacy Investigation Branch investigating the murder of police officer Michael Ferguson in January 1993, yesterday arrested a 51-year-old man in Derry as part of their ongoing enquiries into the killing.

value.name: Man arrested in connection with killing of Catholic policeman in Derry
value.description: Constable Michael Ferguson (21) from Omagh was shot twice in the back of the head by the IRA while on duty in Shipquay Street on January 23, 1993.
